name: Hero Conquest
description:
Hero Conquest is an innovative adventure RPG game with an ambitious story structure. In the game you are trapped in a virtual world and unable to get out. To return to the original world, you must begin a grand adventure!

Open the Gateway Between Worlds with Heroes at Your Side!
Gather mighty partners from all around you, set up your own combat team, train your Heroes, defeat evil monsters, and fight against your rivals. HERO CONQUEST combines strategy and role-playing to deliver a fun and exciting experience!

*Diverse Mini-Games and Endless Excitement!
Explore the world map, where various mini-games are randomly triggered, taking you to new and interesting gaming experiences. Mini-games include Jigsaw Puzzle, Lucky Draw, Gold Mine, Treasure Chest, Little Quiz, Magic Hat, and much more!

*Multiple Game Modes Will Keep You Playing Again and Again
In addition to the main story, ‘Trial Space’ offers other exciting battle modes. You can gain rewards, discover equipment, obtain diamonds, and collect advanced Hero pieces to strengthen your team. Unlimited battle mode offers tons of surprises and endless fun.

- Arena Duels: Fight against real players from all over the world. The higher your rank, the more rewards you can obtain.

- BOSS Attack: Challenge Boss Flax and Constantine with other players and win large numbers of coins and treasure chests!

- Gold Challenge: Defeat monsters to win gold coins, the amount of which depends on your performance.

- Myth Trail Battle: Every day you have a chance to trigger one ‘Myth Trail’ while exploring the map. Friends can be invited to participate in your battle with The Guardians.

*Get Infinite FREE Rewards, Hourly & Daily
You can get at least one 5-Star hero for FREE at the beginning of the game, and receive a large number of gold & diamonds for each daily login. You also receive free chances to draw new Hero cards every day and mega rewards to be won in the ‘Carnival System’. These will keep you going for hours of gameplay, and all without paying.

Download《Hero Conquest》now and start your fantastic adventure!
